source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Do It Yourself Face Mask
items.headline: How to make an easy DIY Face Mask
objectives_summary: How to make a face mask

items.title: Easy Origami with Eleni: Master the Basics of Paper Folding
items.headline: Master origami paper crafts fundamentals by folding over 25 different origami models: perfect for beginners or kids!
objectives_summary: Learn to fold over 25 origami: sailboat, elephant, crane, and more!
How to choose paper and tools for origami
Tips and tricks for folding origami

items.title: Guide To Oil Pastels I Drawing Tutorial & Techniques
items.headline: This class is a refreshing discovery of the unique medium.
objectives_summary: How to use oil pastels safely
What tools & materials to use
The best oil pastel techniques

items.title: UP-CYCLE cards, ribbons, labels & scraps & make cards.

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A

items.headline: No artistic talent is required for this course, just the ability to match colours & themes to make personalised cards.
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to create fabulous 'bespoke' greeting cards.
Students will gain the knowledge to create their own themes.

items.title: Crochet for Complete Beginners
items.headline: Discover your 'crojo'!
objectives_summary: How to understand crochet terminology
How to hold your hook and yarn
How to create four basic crochet stitches

items.title: CP/HP Advanced Soapmaking Pro
items.headline: Help with getting soapmaking certifications
objectives_summary: Learn about basic soapmaking certification
Learn about advanced soapmaking certification
Practice with actual exam questions in each of the course quizzes

items.title: Grow Your Talent with Still Life Drawing Exercises
items.headline: Use the science of learning to become a better artist
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, students will understand what it takes to grow any talent or skill and also feel comfortable applying this learning to drawing a still life with a pencil set.

items.title: Watercolor Words & Roses
items.headline: Make Art using Watercolor Brush Pens
objectives_summary: How to use Watercolor Brush Pens
How to draw a rose
Create a blended background

items.title: Figure Drawing For Beginners; A Simplified Approach

visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner

items.headline: Learn to draw your own stunning figures and poses.
objectives_summary: How to use three main shapes and forms to draw the human figure.
How to use tho basic ideas to draw the figure; gesture & structure.
How to draw the eight main parts of the human body.

items.title: Drawing: Disney Cartoon Characters Sketching
items.headline: Drawing & Art Course, Sketches of Disney Characters
objectives_summary: Drawing of Cartoon Characters of Disneyland
Figure drawing of Characters
Cartoon Drawing Step By Step

items.title: How to Draw a Bunny and Rodents | Master Drawing Animals

visible_instructors.title: Miguel Silva
visible_instructors.name: Miguel

items.headline: Improve your Art by drawing a Bunny and other Rodents from simple Shapes! Fun exercises to master drawing Animals.
objectives_summary: You will know how to Draw a Bunny in several positions
You will learn how to Draw a Squirrel in different positions
You will learn how to Draw a Mouse / Pet Rat in different positions

items.title: Develop YOUR Customized Genealogy Family Tree Board Game

visible_instructors.job_title: Game designer, blogger, author and creative cardboard artist
visible_instructors.title: Luanga Nuwame
visible_instructors.name: Luanga

items.headline: Instructions and downloads to create a customizable family tree board game based on YOUR family and ancestry.
objectives_summary: You will receive 24 Lectures and over an hour worth of step-by-step instruction
You will complete a personalized family tree board game with all the accessories and rules needed to begin playing immediately upon completion
You will have a game that will bring your family together to bond, laugh and learn

objectives_summary: Gouache Painting Techniques
M3 Method of Painting that simplifies painting process and gives an easy to follow sequence of steps
Visual Composition

items.headline: Painting eye, nose, ear, hair, cherries, stilllife, rose and magnolia
objectives_summary: Water colour painting

items.title: Draw Wild Animals using Pastel Pencils Volume 2
items.headline: Learn Pastel Pencil Techniques and Draw a Tiger, Lioness & Fox
objectives_summary: Draw an Tiger, Lioness and Fox using Pastel Pencils
Use the Pastel Pencil Techniques learnt to draw other realistic Animal Paintings
Use the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones

items.title: Simple Portraits | Easy, Effective Portraiture Lessons
items.headline: I teach you the effective and easy methods to draw portraits. I will teach you everything from structure to shading.
objectives_summary: You will learn how to draw head structures
Position features
Draw each feature in detail
